component.name: PhpInterpreters
component.interpreters: <interpreter home="sftp://vagrant@127.0.0.1:/usr/bin/php" id="php-interpreter-" name="Remote PHP ()" debugger_id="php.debugger.XDebug"> <remote_data WEB_SERVER_CONFIG_ID="web-server-id-" WEB_SERVER_CONFIG_NAME="" HOST="127.0.0.1" PORT="" ANONYMOUS="false" USERNAME="vagrant" PASSWORD="" PRIVATE_KEY_FILE="$PROJECT_DIR$/.vagrant/machines/magento2.vagrant/virtualbox/private_key" MY_KNOWN_HOSTS_FILE="" PASSPHRASE="" USE_KEY_PAIR="true" INTERPRETER_PATH="/usr/bin/php" HELPERS_PATH="/home/vagrant/.phpstorm_helpers" INITIALIZED="false" VALID="true" />
